Articles.Content: I don't know if everyone has this problem, but I get auto logged out of the forums within 20-30 minutes of logging in... it's really, really annoying to get logged out that frequently, especially in the middle of writing a post. I could see getting logged off after 24hrs or something, but 20 minutes is excessively short.
Yeah it's a pain, but if you tick the "remember me" box when you login, it should stop logging you out
